QuestData.Title: Postponing the Inevitable
QuestData.Description: Azeroth's ley lines are being redirected to the Nexus.$b$bThe influx of arcane energies is tearing a rift between dimensions.$b$bI cannot stop it, but I've discovered a way to slow it down.$b$bTake this and activate it near the forming rift.
QuestData.LogDescription: Image of Warmage Kaitlyn in the Nexus wants you to use the Interdimensional Refabricator near the rift.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you been to the rift in the Nexus?
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work, $n. The tremors have already begun to subside.$b$bWith any luck, your efforts have granted us sufficient time to find a way to thwart Malygos' efforts.
